content: quote: Originally posted by dghealy: My son is at Fort Knox in reception for another week or two or three. Do they accept express mail or overnight mail- sevice that has to be signed for when it is being sent to a person still in reception? thank you dgh Reception Station is NOT a permanent resident for new arrivals, and 100s are passing through there. Until your son is in Basic Training, he is simply in transit, and has no real address to receive anything. Even if you sent him something, it wouldn't connect with him until Basic (maybe). There would be a real chance it would just be returned or get lost - - Wait a week or two until he is assigned to a Company and Platoon then he will have an address and postal point (Orderly Room) it can definitely be sent to - - Yup, I spent 15 months at Knox - - Wandering and Wondering
